content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own tulip square cardi using this crochet pattern in pdf format this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the available sizes are xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit bust 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 actual measurement at bust 34 34 42 42 42 54 54 66 66 length 22 22 27 27 27 25 25 30 30 arm hole 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 the printable pdf has a total of 11 pages including a * written pattern in us terms * chart for the sizes and measurements * graph for square and triangles * photo tutorial * video tutorial on youtube available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/tulip-square-cardi ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg #sizeinclusive
